senses.sense_definition: A preliminary identification of a medical condition, especially one made before specific symptoms appear.

examples.text: Genetic screening allows for the <w>prediagnosis</w> of certain hereditary conditions.
An accurate <w>prediagnosis</w> can help patients prepare for potential health issues.

senses.sense_definition: Occurring or existing before a medical diagnosis is formally made.

examples.text: The patient felt anxious during the <w>prediagnosis</w> stage of the medical investigation.
Doctors collect vital information during the <w>prediagnosis</w> period to guide their decisions.
